channel.title: Bootstrapping Brighton
channel.description:
Anyone else here in the Brighton-ish area?
I'd be interested to set up a regular-ish meet up for side-projecters, indies and bootstrappers. I'd imagine given Brighton's reputation as a 'town of freelancers' that there should be a few like-minded souls around?
Andy
